criterion: Asks the user which aspect of wound status discrepancies they need help with: editing clinical notes or handling them clinically.
Infers that the user needs help with editing clinical notes exclusively.
Infers that the user needs help exclusively with wound infection.
Includes guidance on wound management and how to edit clinical notes if discrepancies are found.
Includes a disclaimer recommending local policies regarding clinical notes editing.
Advises the user to avoid altering previously omitted errors in patient records and instead perform a fresh clinical evaluation, documenting new findings that support the diagnosis of infection.
Provides a clear and straightforward wound care note using simple language, making it easy for users to understand and follow.
Fails to provide any response to a user query that clearly requires attention, missing the opportunity to deliver helpful information.
